website_summaries.verdict: The perfect hide-away desk organizer for professionals wanting a sleek, put-together look.
pros: Includes 4 shelves for filing and paperwork
Large drawer for smaller office supplies
Sliding door covers file shelves when you want to hide your supplies
cons: Color is lighter than shown online

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 children, 3 of them are in school. They are constantly handing me paper after paper from school or asking for a pencil. I bought this because it has 4 shelves and a drawer. I labeled the top 3 shelves with each of their names and the 4th shelf space for paperwork due the next day. I use the drawer for school supplies such as pencils, pens, glue and index cards. This desk organizer is a complete life saver and takes away a lot of my stress each school day. I just have them put their papers in their specified shelf space and grab supplies as they need them. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell that does not go away with carbon or ventilation after over a year
customer_reviews.text: I'm throwing this thing out. Do not purchase this. I get a massive headache if it is in the same room from the horrid smell. I tried using a fan for a week in a garage, uv light, and dumping it in a container of activated charcoal for a whole month. The smell still stays. and anything you put in there gets the smell on it, and it does not go away. Ruined expensive Apica Premium CD notebooks among other things. If you have zero sense of smell, this would be perfect for you. Otherwise, avoid it like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this A LOT!  But, it is giving off a petrol oil like smell
customer_reviews.text: this is made very well and a solid unit. very functional... perfect for my use. mine however is giving off an unpleasant odor. I'd give it 4 stars. my experience has been if it smells more than a week,, then it will never stop. I kept the box for return, hopefully, the gassing off of the paint or whatever will end soon. most likely I will just put it in the garage for a week or so. That typically works out okay. I do have air filter system that senses odors and comes on, this is NOT setting it off. this makes me think it's not unsafe and the odor is okay.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, practical and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had used this product through my office work, and was so happy with it, that I ordered it for my own home/personal use. It looks very sleek, is very practical for either filing different types of paper or other paperwork, and is made very well. I like that you can pull down the cover and it looks nice and clean. There was an issue with the delivery, some parts of the product were damaged, but this is more due to Amazon's delivery than the vendor. But when I reached out to let them know, they responded immediately and offered a replacement. So, I am happy with their customer service too!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great organzier
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to help organize all the paperwork on my desk but I have cats so I didn't want anything mesh or open because then that requires so much maintenance on my end to get the cat litter, cat dust, danger and hair out of it. so this was a perfect find. it's great for all my paperwork and helped me clear up so much space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Worst Smell Imaginable, Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: The formaldehyde stench is a room-filling, all-encompassing nightmare that will not end. You will cough, your head will ache, and you will feel ill. The smell will not go away even with baking soda and months of airing out the room it was in. It has a beautiful design, but it's not wood -- it's held together with a formaldehyde resin that keeps out-gassing and makes everyone around it feel sick. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a million  bucks
customer_reviews.text: When you place ANYTHING on the shelves it Does Not allow the hatch to close completely. It does not hold documents, letters or envelopes well. Only a small amount of papers less than 8.5 x 11 will fit on shelves. I purchased as a present for my Husbands desk top - It looks very handsome there - however, it is not very practical - and it is not solid high quality wood but, a painted veneer. I kept it - It is beautiful - but, I would not reorder or recommend at this price point ($69.99)
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, sturdy, and professional looking piece. As another person (pics. shown), I stacked a few paper trays (2) on top, which works well for more space. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 stars is because it should be a 1/2" deeper to place 1" binders inside, so the cover will close. The binders can still fit, but you cannot close the cover to hide contents. The bottom drawer fits boxes of staples, paper clips, etc., but it is not very deep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this piece. It came very well packaged and had no dings or imperfections. The wood is solid and heavy. The paint is satiny smooth. The drawers slide easily (they are not on runners). And it's a nice size. I also ordered another piece from the company and it was also great. They're strong enough to stack on each other. Nice to find something for the office that isn't shoddy and based on deceptive pictures!
customer_reviews.author: L. Fouquette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When I initially ordered this organizer, I was shipped the wrong color. After filing a claim, a replacement unit was sent (which was also the incorrect color). I called Victor customer service, and the representative who assisted me was fantastic. She was extremely responsive, apologized for the error, and guaranteed me they would get a replacement unit out to me ASAP. Even though the initial two units arrived in the wrong color, they are very well made. This unit provide a very organized look to my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Traci K

customer_reviews.title: Stong Toxic Smell
customer_reviews.text: Returned It! I loved the fact that It had a door to close it up. It would have been perfect for what I needed it for. But the smell was too bad and I wasnt sure if it was toxic or not. Plus the back wasnt connected. It popped out when I closed the drawer. If it wasnt for the smell I would have just replaced it. Very disappointed it had to smell so bad. It was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: My mail and projects aren't a mess anymore so that's nice. But I can't help but feel I paid too much even if it does work as intended flawlessly. Just that price bothers me, but I use it every day so am not retuning it and really is just so practical for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s nice quality and sturdy. I can keep my papers organized and hidden away. I ordered monitor stand/organizer by Victor. I am so happy to find them. I feel so much better with everything being organized on my desk instead of looking like clutter.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA JETT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This item is well built, and you can see it in the quality of the material. Enough shelf to stay organized and love the cover that comes over to keep tidy and private. I unfortunately had to return it because it turned out to be too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MGB

customer_reviews.title: Unable to remove toxic odor
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a good product, however, I question the quality and safety of it. Despite multiple attempts to remove the toxic odor, it persists. I have let it sit outdoors for 3-4 days at a time, several times this month, but the toxic smell remains. When I bring it back into my office to use, it fills my work area with a chemical odor. It does not seem like a safe product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, and especially love the pocket door that ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous! Gorgeous pieces (I bought two), who are as functional as they are attractive. I use them as monitor stands, as I am very tall and need something high to get the monitors to the proper height. Love them, and especially love the pocket door that drops down from the top to hide all of the files when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. CD Brown

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for something like this for my kitchen counter for a very long time....wanted it for bills, paper work, etc. This came and I love it. Very nice looking, sturdy, and lots of room, Door and drawer opens and close easily. It came fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: patricia kleban

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchased I bought this to store work folders and planned on storing multiple folders in each slot. I wish it had one more slot, or the bottom drawer was a slot instead, but all in all great office organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, funny smell though...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey for a desk organizer, but it is made really well & of really good quality. I really like the design of it & you can tell it will last a long time! But as soon as I opened the box this chemical smell (paint?) was released, so now my entire office smells like it. Not very pleasant, I think it's starting to go away...or I'm getting used to it. Otherwise, beautiful organizer.
customer_reviews.author: roxy0990

customer_reviews.title: took it out of the box and I really like it. It appears to be well made and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this; took it out of the box and I really like it. It appears to be well made and thought out. My desktop looks MUCH better for it. There was a flyer in the device from the company. Looks like they make a bunch of stuff for desktop organization. I'll be buying some more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Will Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Solid Wood Cabinet with Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little cabinet for multiple uses.I use the cabinet under my printer to hold different printer papers, multiple size photo papers and supplies. The solid wood cabinet comes in multiple colors, black, white, brown and classic silver. I have purchased the black with comes with nice finish, Has a front door that comes down and hides the contents inside. It has cleaned up the printer area andd now I can find things when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: happy camper
customer_reviews.text: I recieve my desktop organizer, at first I was a little undecided to order one but now I am glad that I did. it is beautiful. I Place it on my computer desk and it looks great up there., the quality of it is nice. I am one happy camper. I got compliments on this desktop organizer already. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: dogmae

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Smooth Operation
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this organizing cabinet! It hides a multitude of sins. It’s a high quality piece. The door that lifts is easy to retract and put it down from the up position.
customer_reviews.author: sawwhetowls

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this last December and I really want to like it. It is perfect in nearly almost every ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last December and I really want to like it. It is perfect in nearly almost every way. Although it's MDF and not real wood, the weight and look are incredibly nice. It has a drawer and shelves and a sliding door to close off the inside when you have guests. The only real problem to me is the SMELL. It's awful and regardless of everything we've tried it won't go away. I would gladly change this review if there was any way to get rid fo the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Moiz A Basit

customer_reviews.title: The packing was so poor that this organizer came absolutely shattered
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. The packing was so poor that this organizer came absolutely shattered. Both the manufacturer and the seller did the poorest job in protecting the product. I am extremely disappointed because this design was perfect for my office setup.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful on a small desk
customer_reviews.text: This is very well put together. You can't tell in the photo, but it has a piece of wood that comes down over the open shelves, which is lovely. It gives me the option of hiding any mess I have in there when people are over, if so needed. The drawer is narrow, but I think it will still be quite useful.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Walker

customer_reviews.title: great for paper storage
customer_reviews.text: This item is just what I needed to store important papers I need almost every day
customer_reviews.author: gallsatx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiding bills and papers that get left all over the table!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the pricey side, but just what I was looking for! I have been trying to find something that would hide a stack of bills, papers and lists that get left on our kitchen table. I wanted something that wasn’t plastic or looked like it only belonged in an office. This was the perfect solution! It looks classy, has a panel that covers up the front, and keeps the table looking less cluttered!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The coolest office products I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the nicest organizer I’ve ever bought. You can even close the front of it it has a little door that comes down so you don’t have to see all your paperwork. I got mine in silver matches my desk. I looove it!!! These guys have amazing office products!
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Yes, it smells when you first get it. That dissipates in a few days. It holds my various types of paper. This is for 8 1/2 x 11 paper, with room to spare. You may have to take "packaged" items such as business cards, etc. out of the package if you want to close the door. If you use larger items (like report covers), they may not allow for the door to close.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L.

customer_reviews.title: it does what I need and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for different colored papers and cardstock. It keeps them nice and looks great. It seems pretty sturdy, I think it should last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, well packed, fully assembled without problems. What made our choice for this organizer was the size. There are similar looking organizers that are less expensive that have a footprint smaller than 8.5x11. Any desk organizer that can't hold a piece of paper is worthless. This is perfect for all the clutter that used to sit on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Dale_I

customer_reviews.title: It works great and fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my home office. It works great and fits my needs. I can keep important papers within easy reach, and the slide down cover keeps everything looking neat. My only suggestion to improve is to offer an option that offers a little extra depth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kim

customer_reviews.title: Way nicer than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This actually turned out to be significantly nicer than I thought it would be. It's solid - actually a bit heavy for its size. It looks great, blends in with my office, and thanks to the handy drop down door, let's me hide my paperwork when I don't want to be looking at it. Super happy with this one!
customer_reviews.author: K Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage for my husband who like to leave all ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect storage for my husband who like to leave all his papers, mail and documents laying around on the kitchen table. He has two desk full of documents and junk and now is using my dinning table. I think next fix will be to move him into the garage where he can leave his junk on his work bench
customer_reviews.author: Crunch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic desktop organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color as it goes so well with my existing decor! Sleek and contemporary for my home office. I saw a black one in an office supply store they wanted over $100. for it. So I checked Amazon and found out that it comes in several colors. It certainly fits my need perfectly, I love being organized and things are tucked away out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: WS@home

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My sister asked for this for Christmas and is thrilled with it. Strong enough to hold printer on top and love the door that hides all the clutter :=)
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it is ready to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it is ready to use, it is solid, the shelves are fixed, they can not be moved, it has a small drawer below and a lid so that the contents can not be seen, buy the black one, it looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Great desk organization
customer_reviews.text: Great desk organization. Fits letter sized paper to keep my inbox and outbox organized. First minor complaint: it smelled bad when I first got it from the paint. After airing out for a couple weeks, the smell went away. Second minor complaint: The door to the shelves is hard to close. I wish it had something to grab onto. It is very slippery and when it is open all the way it is hard to get a hold of to pull it out and close.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, easy to just slide the slats into ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks so sharp in my office. Good construction, easy to just slide the slats into place. Purchased Silver File organizer and it fits perfectly on top. Have gotten a lot of compliments. A bit pricier than your average office supply stuff, but def worth it when compared for quality!
customer_reviews.author: nej

customer_reviews.title: IT's good but
customer_reviews.text: It has a very very horrible smell. It made me sick. I really like it but dont want to return it. It also came in with a chipped corner.
customer_reviews.author: mlor

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these. They are sturdy and good quality. I have 2 stacked and that works well. Love that the door slides out and down to cover the contents of the shelves. All of the Victor collection I have bought have been 5 star products. The black color is a matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I was disappointed, especially since it was packaged so well
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this, however when I got it, it came broken. Nothing some wood glue couldn't fix, but I was disappointed, especially since it was packaged so well. Other than that, I really do like this product. It is serving it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Victor Wood box
customer_reviews.text: This box is absolutely beautiful and extremely useful....I purchased it for my son-in-law...he didn't need it so I kept it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn V. Scalzitti

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: As I've said wo about the rest of this line, these are very high quality items that appear very high end. If you have a cherry desk, don't be afraid, it is a gorgeous and unobtrusive match. My husband took mine and now uses it to organize, well, basically everything.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Looks perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The finish looks better in real life. As a result of other peoples' complaints, the packaging was probably redesigned and is excellent now. Cleaning and disinfecting it inside was a bit of a challenge because of the narrow clearance between shelves. I had to be inventive. The shelves should have been removable for this very reason.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Desk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these units. They are very well built and stylish. I believe they will be a nice addition to my office.
customer_reviews.author: always truthful

customer_reviews.title: Instead I used it for my lamp stand which works beautifully. The piece is quite high so the lamp ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this piece as a monitor riser however, it was substantially higher than I anticipated. Instead I used it for my lamp stand which works beautifully. The piece is quite high so the lamp illuminates my desk much better than it had before. Packaging was perfect, well wrapped and padded. The product is sturdy with no dings, scratches or imperfections to report. I recommend this product for office organization, especially as an in/out box with drawer storage for your most use office supplies. Compared to higher priced items at local office supply stores, this piece was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love the fold down door!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that there is a "garage door" type closure that allows you to hide everything. The pull out tray keeps pens and supplies handy without them disappearing into a file tray. The backing is cardboard which surprised me at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Tropicfive

customer_reviews.title: and have my copy paper and shipping labels nicely organized inside
customer_reviews.text: I set my printer/copier on top, and have my copy paper and shipping labels nicely organized inside. I like that you can close it up, and it looks even nicer! :) I keep my calculator and some coupons in the drawer...
customer_reviews.author: gbergey

customer_reviews.title: Style and organization in one.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packed and in perfect condition. The item itself is just as described and well made. I like the design which is nice if you want to keep a clean organized desktop because it closes up when you are done. No messy papers are visible on your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The stench when you first open the box is enough ...
customer_reviews.text: The stench when you first open the box is enough to make you vomit. I let it sit outside for 2 days and then it is bearable. I don't keep it closed because then the smell returns. If yhey could get rid of the odor, it would be a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful collection
customer_reviews.text: After pricing office supplies at Staples and Office Depot, Victor Wood seemed like a bargain. The organizer arrived well packed and in tact. The whole collection is solid wood and has enough weight to be sturdy and provided much needed storage in a small office. The matte finish prevents this collection from looking gaudy. Overall impression was professional, yet warm atmosphere that I wished to convey while still storing office supplies and files in an organized discreet manner. I would purchase again and recommend to coworkers (male or female).
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, masculine piece of desk organization
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, masculine piece of desk organization. My desk now radiates authority and power. And organization. Seriously, good stuff. Much better than those stupid plastic trays. One solid piece, plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: galen gower

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet stinky
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, solid piece HOWEVER it smelled horrible of strong fumes when it was first opened. We had to have it sit on the porch for days to air out. Consider another organizer if you are sensitive to fumes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, well-made desk accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, very well-made desktop organizer. The only thing I don't like is that the drawer is so low that the desk in front of it has to be completely clear to open the drawer. A minor point, but the reason for 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a monitor stand and it has been perfect. Most of the monitor stands are not tall ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a monitor stand and it has been perfect. Most of the monitor stands are not tall enough, so I wound up purchasing this item. The storage is helpful and the quality is high.
customer_reviews.author: A97068

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little hide-away for miscellaneous desk stuff & spare ink cartridges! Beautiful finish and sturdy construction. Initially balked at the price but this is not throw-away piece. Expect never to have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: NH Native

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I now own three of these organizers. They look good and work as expected. I love that when I have company I can pull down the front and hide all of the paper work.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad Tax Service & Bookkeeping, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Would like another one
customer_reviews.text: It looks and is exactly what was advertised. Would like another one, but am not willing to pay the high price.
customer_reviews.author: MRK

customer_reviews.title: Great for printer storage and organizing
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny printer that fits right on top, works great for storing extra supplies/organizing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lanthier

customer_reviews.title: Good Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built product. Wood is heavier than some of the cheaper similar products so should hold up to the test of time. Wood "flap" comes down and covers trays hiding papers to help tidy the desk. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer27

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: the dividers are not wide up and down like I hoped. will use in my second office which i rarely ever use. other victor products like letter trays, etc. are more my desire.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Alford Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Still off-gassing after several months.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and functional unit. Smells horrible even after several months.
customer_reviews.author: Jim (Science/Tech/Parent)

customer_reviews.title: A great little organizer
customer_reviews.text: A great little organizer! Good quality, even though it was made in China... :/ But I love the door that covers up the papers inside, leaving a clean looking space. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Actually a pretty nice organizer, which works great for organizing kids work but the wood is kind of thin and it has a distinctive paint smell that is not great. I hope the smell will get better overtime.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Service and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my Third Victor product in the Midnight Black Collection. Well made and makes my office more organized.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, solid.
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is really good quality and it looks beautiful. It is well built, the drawer and the flap have smooth operation. The only drawback is the hefty price, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: cldsk

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful item, well constructed and very smooth and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item, well constructed and very smooth and easy to manipulate. My only gripe is that the interior has a harsh smell that has lingered for almost two years no mater how long I leave the door open to air it out. But otherwise it works very well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: RATSAWGOD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They have a strange smell it of the package, but once they’ve aired out, they’re very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with both pieces I bought
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with both pieces I bought. Well made and perfect for what I'm using them for. I will be looking at the other pieces you have . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Not only is that a useful piece of office equipment it's attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Belson

customer_reviews.title: Nice decor to my desk
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Makes my cubicle look classy while hiding n holding items I need access to.
customer_reviews.author: Story

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it...just what I was looking for...really tidies up the office
customer_reviews.author: AddieT

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a large scratch on the top.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is OK, however, the large scratch on top is very visible and non-repairable. The scratch is depressed into the wood. Won't buy from this vendor again, based on product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was a little pricey, I really like this organizer. I am using it in the bathroom to organize my jewelry, barrettes, and headbands. I bought a few cheap jewelry display inserts and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent organizer. Been looking for the right organizer. Perfect fit on the desk to.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Very Organized!
customer_reviews.text: Clean, crisp and keeps my desk neat. This fits nicely on the desk and looks great. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Historical romance lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: The Organizer was shipped in perfect condition. My desk now looks nice and tidy rather than everything all over the desk. Additional bonus, I was able to put my computer monitor on top of the organizer so my posture and position are much more ergonomically correct. Very sturdy. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is great, woks just as expected and looks good also. Very sturdy as needed as well.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Beck

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It does smell a little, but after leaving it open, it went away. Quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Oseth

customer_reviews.title: A nice compact organizer for our office.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a bit pricey, but it does exactly what we need it to do. The first one arrived with a manufacturing defect, and it was promptly and cheerfully replaced by the seller, who did not even want the broken one to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Victor office piece I've purchased. They are well-made, functional and blends into my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nice & sturdy. Good size draw & shevels. I love you can hide all your paper work & accessories behind the sliding door panel.
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite pieces in the collection
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite pieces in the collection. The pull down cover is really great at keeping unwanted dust out while still keeping the paper and notebooks within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer! Bought it for my new office because we need to have a clean, neat apperance and it is very well built and looks great on top of my desk. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great hiding place for paper!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, attractive. It serves as a catchall for papers in my kitchen. It's nice that you can close it up to hide everything.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so nice. It is the perfect size. I just love it!

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This actually surprised me how nicely it is put together. Perfect size and looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking
customer_reviews.text: It fits so perfectly on my desk. I love that it covers my paper files and makes my desk look less cluttered. It's made with good material and fits a file folder perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Loved this so much that I bought another one!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking and well constructed piece of furniture. I loved it so much that I bought another one and stacked it on top! Now my desk has a place for absolutely everything. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all my notepads organized and I love that the "door" can shut and cover all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Keeps all my notepads organized and I love that the "door" can shut and cover all the mess. Nice weight and looks great on my desk. All my clutter is organized and hidden from view.
customer_reviews.author: CassandraW

customer_reviews.title: this is a wonderful desktop cabinet
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful desktop cabinet. The finish is very nice. I have had it about a year now and every day I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Boggie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can put away papers when I’m away from my desk without anyone that’s walking through the door see it... I also use it to put away papers that I use the most to find it more easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like my screens rather high and it works very well
customer_reviews.text: I actually even use this as a screen stand for my computer at work. I like my screens rather high and it works very well!

customer_reviews.title: I might be too picky....
customer_reviews.text: The finish is great and the size is perfect but closing the face cover is a dog.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it I do love it ,but as one of the other reviews stated it has a strong order to it. Hope it goes away soon. I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. came in as described and well packaged. feels sturdy so far. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful - Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: So very impressed with this piece. Looks very expensive and professional. My only negative comment is that Amazon sent me the wrong item first off and did very little to correct it (gave me my money back but wouldn't let me reorder it from another vendor at the same price). Holds everything you need and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyMegs

customer_reviews.title: Great extra storage option
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a coworker who needed extra storage in our minimalist office. Very sleek lines and we love that you can close up the front. Good quality, perfect size, we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Goldberg

product_meta.title: Victor Wood Midnight Black Collection, 4-Shelf Desktop Organizer, Black, (4720-5)
product_meta.description: Size:Four full sized shelves| Color:Midnight BlackThe Victor Midnight Black Collection brings a fresh perspective to desk accessories by offering functional solutions with appealing design elements. The 4720-5 Desktop Organizer provides four shelves and one large drawer for flexible storage of files and desk supplies. The sliding door on top pulls out and closes in front to easily hide contents when you want a clean look. Combine two or more Desktop Organizers to create an elegant literature rack or storage system. Features sturdy 11.9 lb. wood construction with a durable double coated matte black finish. Stylish 14" x 10.75" x 9.75" design with crown molding base makes a great addition to any desk. Perfect for use either at home or in the office. Enter the search term “Victor Midnight Black Collection” to see the entire lineup including: Corner Shelf, Printer Stand, Stacking Letter Tray, Business Card Holder, Monitor Riser, Magazine Holder, Tidy Tower, Incline File, Reversible Book End, Pencil Cup with Note Holder.
feature_bullets: Attractive midnight black smooth matte finish
Sliding door on top pulls out to cover file shelves
Large, pull-out drawer for pens and desk supplies
Stackable:Combine 2 or more to create a stylish literature rack or storage system
Non-Slip Rubber Feet:Reduces movement and protect your work surface from scratches and scuffs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
